Subject: Exclusions

Hi,
I'm trying to set up a simple static exclusion list. We're currently 
using wayback 1.4.2.

I added
<property name="exclusionFactory">
<bean 
class="org.archive.wayback.accesscontrol.staticmap.StaticMapExclusionFilterFactory" 
init-method="init">
<property name="file" value="/home/test/wayback_exclude.txt" />
<property name="checkInterval" value="600" />
</bean>
</property>
to both my access point (an archivalurlreplay access point and 
proxyreplay access point which is a child of it).

Then, for testing purposes, I created the exclude file with a single url 
in it ( 
http://mtp.hum.ku.dk/cgibin/pdfmedopenaccess/ancient_harp_seal_h_330_0_9788763530675.pdf 
). I restarted wayback and noted that the catalina log says
catalina.out:INFO: Reloading exclusion file /home/test/wayback_exclude.txt

But ... nutz! The url can still be loaded in wayback. Did I 
misunderstand something?

--
Colin Rosenthal
IT Developer
State and University Library, Aarhus
Denmark
